alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 9:31AM EST until December 17 at 3:11PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. .Water levels in minor flood stage and are forecast to continue to subside. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Alafia River at Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Water begins to impact homes on Pine Avenue and Park Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EST Sunday was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 3.3 feet late this morning. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.4 feet on 12/26/2004. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 4.4 Sun 9 am 0.6 1.0 1.6 1.5 0.0 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 315 PM EST.
